response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. This product is tailored to meet your specific needs and is valued at $1,000,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product from us at a special price of $900,000. This represents a significant savings of $100,000 compared to its market value, making it a highly attractive proposition for you. I look forward to discussing how we can bring this opportunity to fruition.", "product_price": 900000}
